pages.text: The filtered hopper allows for specific filtering of materials such as gravel or sand with through specific filters.

More importantly, I'm able to filter $(l:innovation/materials/hellfire_dust)hellfire dust$() from grounded up netherrack through a soul sand filter.$(br2)I should make sure that the filtered hopper is mechanically powered from the side when processing netherrack though to fully grind up the remnants of ghasts or else I may find myself in a hell of a mess to say the least...
